latex-graphics-helper.shell.description: Shell to use for executing commands. If not specified, the default shell for your operating system will be used (powershell.exe on Windows, /bin/zsh on macOS, /bin/bash on others).

latex-graphics-helper.pdfcropOutputPath.description: Output file name when cropping a pdf file.

latex-graphics-helper.drawioCommand.description: Path to the drawio executable. If not specified, the default path for your operating system will be used ("C:\Program Files\draw.io\draw.io.exe" on Windows, /Applications/draw.io.app/Contents/MacOS/draw.io on macOS, drawio on others).

latex-graphics-helper.drawioToPdfOutputP.description: Output file name when converting a PDF file.

latex-graphics-helper.placementSpecifier.description: Whether to use the default placement specifiers for LaTeX figures and tables.
Default placement specifiers for LaTeX figures and tables.
Available placement specifiers for LaTeX figures and tables.

latex-graphics-helper.graphicsOptions.de.description: Default graphics options for LaTeX figures and tables.

latex-graphics-helper.minipageOptions.us.description: Whether to use the default options for LaTeX minipage environments.

latex-graphics-helper.minipageOptions.de.description: Default options for LaTeX minipage environments.

latex-graphics-helper.minipageOptions.ch.description: Available options for LaTeX minipage environments.

latex-graphics-helper.pdfToPngOutputPath.description: Output file name when converting a PDF file to PNG. Depends on pdftocairo. The file extension is added automatically.

latex-graphics-helper.pdfToJpegOutputPat.description: Output file name when converting a PDF file to JPEG. Depends on pdftocairo. The file extension is added automatically.

latex-graphics-helper.pdfToSvgOutputPath.description: Output file name when converting a PDF file to SVG. Depends on pdftocairo.

latex-graphics-helper.pdfToPngOptions.description: Options passed to pdftocairo when converting PDF to PNG.

latex-graphics-helper.pdfToJpegOptions.description: Options passed to pdftocairo when converting PDF to JPEG.

latex-graphics-helper.pdfToSvgOptions.description: Options passed to pdftocairo when converting PDF to SVG.

latex-graphics-helper.inkscapeCommand.description: Path to the inkscape executable. If not specified, the default path for your operating system will be used ("C:\Program Files\Inkscape\bin\inkscape.exe" on Windows, inkscape on others).

latex-graphics-helper.pngToPdfOutputPath.description: Output file name when converting a PNG file to PDF. Depends on inkscape.

latex-graphics-helper.jpegToPdfOutputPat.description: Output file name when converting a JPEG file to PDF. Depends on inkscape.

latex-graphics-helper.svgToPdfOutputPath.description: Output file name when converting a SVG file to PDF. Depends on inkscape.

latex-graphics-helper.clipboardImageOutp.description: Output file name when saving clipboard images to a file. The file extension is added automatically.

latex-graphics-helper.autoConvertToPdfOn.description: Automatically convert images to PDF on save.

latex-graphics.helper.geminiAIModel.description: Selects the Gemini AI model to be used for generating LaTeX code from images.

default: Convert the uploaded file into a LaTeX equation and output it.
Convert the uploaded file into a LaTeX table and output it.
latex-graphics-helper.geminiRequestList.description: List of predefined requests for the Gemini AI model to generate LaTeX code from images. These requests appear as options in the context menu.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
